answers.answer: I failed my one hour with a 147, and passed the 3 hour with "flying colors" if you only failed by a few points you will be fine. They are usually only concerned if you fail by alot. Also, i did not follow the three day diet before the 3 hour test. I ate like normal. Good luck!
I hope I pass it!! :) they never gave me a diet 3 days before I ate normal too.. I just couldn't eat anything from midnight the night before until after the test..
They told me to eat n drink like I would do normally just stop for that hour I have to do the drink ... hope I pass
I failed the first hour one, but my three hour test was perfect. Goodluck!
I am taking my 3 hour test Monday! I failed my 1 hour with a 174.
I failed the one hour by 3 points and I passed the 3 hour you'll be fine good luck:)
Thanks ladies! I hope I do pass. Hope you other ladies pass yours as well! :)
I was at the cut off for the one hour test so i am going to do my 3 hour test next Friday. I'm so nervous. I just hate diabetes!
I failed both of mine. But it's not the end of the world. The only thing they are going to have you do first is check your sugar levels and see a dietician. But good luck to you!
I failed the one hour by 20 points but passed my 3 hour you'll be ok specially only failing by that little amount ...you'll be ok nothing to worry about

Failed both unfortunately. Good thing is it will help motivate me to est healthier. Crappy thing is, I never really ate all the sugary snacks with this pregnancy, my two previous pregnancies That's all I ate and never had to do the 3hr test.

question: I found out I failed my 1 hour glucose by 5 points! Anyone else fails by that many and then pass the 3 hour test? I had my 3 hour yesterday and the drs seem to think that I will pass just hoping others had passed :)
title: glucose test
